Title: Establishes the crime of criminal use of weapons; firing into a crowded space
Summary: Makes it a class B violent felony to fire a gun into a crowded space with the intent to harm or absent the intent to harm when such an act creates a great risk of death to one or more people within the crowded space; establishes the crime of criminal use of weapons; firing into a crowded space.
LawCode: Amd ยง70.02, add ยง265.34, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of criminal use of weapons; firing into a crowded space
